title: HITMAN 3 – Pre-order Today
text: We are excited to reveal the release date, editions, pre-order bonuses and next-gen upgrade options for HITMAN 3.

title: Introducing HITMAN 3 (Gameplay Trailer)
text: Watch the new ‘Introducing HITMAN 3’ trailer that showcases new and returning features and items plus 4K gameplay that we’ve captured directly from in-engine.

title: HITMAN 3 on PC
text: Find out how PC players will experience HITMAN 3 and share details about some of the features you can expect in January 2021 and beyond.

title: HITMAN 3 – Chongqing
text: We are super excited to announce a brand new HITMAN 3 location. Welcome to the rainy, neon-lit streets of Chongqing, China.

title: IOI x Intel
text: IOI is partnering with Intel to provide the best possible performance and optimization for our PC players in HITMAN 3.

title: Project 007
text: Project 007 is a brand new James Bond video game with a wholly original story to be developed and published by IOInteractive.

title: 20 Years of Hitman
text: Since November 2000, Agent 47 has completed 100+ missions and the Hitman franchise has more than 70 million lifetime players. #Hitman20Years

title: HITMAN 3 – Physical Editions Confirmed
text: We’re pleased to announce our plans to release physical copies of HITMAN 3, including details of the editions, pre-order bonus and next-gen upgrades.

title: HITMAN 3 – Nintendo Switch
text: We’re excited to announce that HITMAN 3 will be coming to Nintendo Switch, playable via cloud streaming technology.

title: Freedom Fighters
text: We’re super excited to announce that Freedom Fighters, our cult-classic from 2003, will be available digitally on PC, starting today!

title: HITMAN on Stadia
text: HITMAN launches on Stadia on September 1st and we’re excited to welcome new players to the World of Assassination.

title: HITMAN 3 – Dartmoor
text: Discover the secrets of an old manor and uncover clues to solve the Thornbridge Mystery. Welcome to Dartmoor in HITMAN 3.

title: HITMAN VR: Become the Hitman
text: The team at IO Interactive share insights into HITMAN 3’s VR support and talk about what players can expect from this new way to play the game.

title: Announcing HITMAN VR
text: Play the entire World of Assassination trilogy in VR with HITMAN 3! Get up close to your targets and immerse yourself in 20+ exotic locations from around the world.

title: HITMAN arrives on STADIA
text: We’re excited to announce that the World of Assassination trilogy is coming to Stadia!

title: HITMAN 3 – The End of A Journey
text: The team at IO Interactive share insights into HITMAN 3’s development and talk about what players can expect from the game.

title: Announcing HITMAN 3
text: HITMAN 3 is the dramatic conclusion to the World of Assassination trilogy. Agent 47 returns as a ruthless professional for the most important contracts of his entire career.

title: Curated Contracts: Chaos_Agent_45
text: The June Contract Curator is locked and ready. He is known for many things, but primarily one – SNIPING. Meet CHAOS_AGENT_45.

title: HITMAN 2 – June Content Calendar
text: The June Content Calendar for HITMAN 2 brings a hot round of content including Featured Contracts, The Undying Returns and more!

title: Curated Contracts: Urben
text: Community Member Urben’s 11 curated contracts are live now in HITMAN 2. But what goes behind making them? Well, we asked him.

title: HITMAN 2 – May Content Calendar
text: The HITMAN 2 May Content Calendar brings a Spring-fresh take on Featured Contracts, The Stowaway Reactivated Elusive Target and more!

title: Curated Contracts: KevinRudd
text: Community Member KevinRudd’s 11 curated contracts are live now in HITMAN 2. But what goes behind making them? Well, we asked him.

title: HITMAN 2 – April Content Calendar
text: The April Content Calendar for HITMAN 2 brings a fresh round of content including Featured Contracts, two reactivated Elusive Targets and more!

title: Studio Update – Regarding COVID-19
text: Last week at IOI, we took some very important and necessary steps to protect the health of our teams in Copenhagen and Malmö as a response to the COVID-19 outbreak.

title: HITMAN 2 – March Content Calendar
text: The March Content Calendar for HITMAN 2 brings another round of content including Featured Contracts, a reactivated Elusive Target and more!

title: Curated Contracts: Frote7
text: 2020’s Second official Contract Curator is here! He was given the task of picking 10 contracts for you to enjoy – He’s fast, he’s funny and he’s Frote7.

title: HITMAN 2 – February Content Calendar
text: The February Content Calendar for HITMAN 2 has arrived and forecasts what is to come throughout the month.

title: Curated Contracts: MulletPride
text: The HITMAN 2 Curated Contracts for January are almost ready to be unleashed. Play them on Jan 23 and meet Mulletpride, this month’s curator, right now!

title: HITMAN 2 – January Content Calendar
text: Welcome to a new year, a new decade and a new way to get your monthly information on HITMAN 2 content!

title: 12 Days of Contracts 🎅
text: 12 Days of Contracts is a special Holiday version of Curated Contracts, were 12 community members created holiday-themed contracts for HITMAN 2.

title: HITMAN 2 – December Roadmap
text: The HITMAN 2 December Roadmap rounds out the year with a flurry of new content – including an Elusive Target!

title: HITMAN 2 Anniversary
text: Celebrate the HITMAN 2 anniversary with a reminder of all the great content that has been released over the last 12 months!

title: HITMAN 2 – November Update
text: The November Update for HITMAN 2 brings tweaks and improvements to the game.

title: HITMAN 2 – November Roadmap
text: The HITMAN 2 November Roadmap is a celebration of HITMAN 2’s anniversary and we’re bringing more live content in a single month than we ever have before!

title: HITMAN 2 – October Update
text: The October Update for HITMAN 2 brings a spooky Halloween Escalation for all players to enjoy – plus a game update with tweaks and improvements.

title: IOI and WBIE enter agreement for new console and PC game
text: We are excited to announce a worldwide publishing and distribution agreement with Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment to bring a new console and PC game experience to players worldwide.

title: HITMAN 2 – October Roadmap
text: The October Roadmap for HITMAN 2 brings a new Halloween mission, a brand new Elusive Target and more unlocks than ever before!

title: HITMAN 2 – September Update
text: The HITMAN 2 September Update includes a content drop for Expansion Pass owners, quality-of-life improvements & numerous fixes and tweaks for all players.

title: HITMAN 2 – Haven Island
text: The exciting conclusion to the HITMAN 2 Expansion Pass will be released on September 24. Here’s everything you need to know about Haven Island.

title: HITMAN 2 – September Roadmap
text: The September Roadmap for HITMAN 2 brings a new sandbox location for Expansion Pass owners and a full month of live content for all players!

title: HITMAN 2 – August Update
text: The HITMAN 2 August Update includes a content drop for Expansion Pass owners, quality-of-life improvements & numerous fixes and tweaks for all players.

title: HITMAN – Noclip
text: In July 2019, Noclip spent two days at the Copenhagen office to learn about how we work, our company culture and what goes into making our Hitman games.

title: HITMAN 2 – August Roadmap
text: The August Roadmap for HITMAN 2 brings a new suit pack for Expansion Pass owners and the return of the fan-favourite ‘Homing Briefcase’.

title: HITMAN 2 – Siberia
text: A brand new Sniper Assassin map for HITMAN 2 will be released on July 30 for Expansion Pass owners. Here’s everything you need to know about Siberia

title: HITMAN 2 – July Update
text: The HITMAN 2 July Update invites Expansion Pass owners to Siberia for our newest Sniper Assassin location! Plus, lots of gameplay fixes and updates.

title: HITMAN 2 – July Roadmap
text: The July Roadmap for HITMAN 2 has arrived and a ton of new content is on the horizon for all players – including a new Sniper Assassin Map, for all Expansion Pass owners!

title: HITMAN 2 – The Bank
text: A brand new location for HITMAN 2 will be released on June 25 for Expansion Pass owners. Here’s everything you need to know about The Bank.

title: HITMAN 2 – June Update
text: The HITMAN 2 June Update invites Expansion Pass owners to New York for our newest sandbox location: The Bank! Plus, two new Special Assignment missions!

title: The Undying – World Record
text: We’re excited to announce that HITMAN 2 will feature in the Guinness World Records Gamer’s Edition 2020 with two full pages dedicated to our beloved series.

title: HITMAN 2 – June Roadmap
text: The June Roadmap for HITMAN 2 has arrived and a ton of new content is on the horizon for all players – including new Expansion Pass missions!

title: HITMAN 2 – May Update
text: The HITMAN 2 May Update includes bug fixes, Ghost Mode tweaks and menu optimizations as well as preparing for a huge month of new content in June.

title: Intel Speedrun Competition (PC ONLY)
text: Together with Intel, we’re looking to find the most creative and accomplished HITMAN 2 PC player out there!

title: Copenhagen Flames Partnership
text: We’re happy to officially announce that IO Interactive has entered into a partnership with Danish esports club, Copenhagen Flames.

title: HITMAN 2 – May Roadmap
text: Welcome to the May-hem of Spring Break in HITMAN 2! Sean Bean is back in “The Undying Returns”, we’ve got new unlocks, new contracts and a whole lot more!

title: HITMAN 2 – April Update
text: The HITMAN 2 April Update includes a major update for Ghost Mode, changes to how the Silent Assassin rating is calculated and much more!

title: HITMAN 2 – Content Highlights
text: We’re super excited to share a first look at new HITMAN 2 content and give our players a glimpse into the future of the game.

title: HITMAN 2 – April Roadmap
text: Welcome to a new month full of content for HITMAN 2. We have new items, emotes and a new Location coming to Ghost Mode, plus even more…

title: HITMAN 2 – Hantu Port
text: Hantu Port has arrived in HITMAN 2! This brand new Sniper Assassin map in Singapore is the first major content drop for the HITMAN 2 Expansion Pass.

title: HITMAN 2 – March Update
text: The HITMAN 2 March Update includes brand new content for Expansion Pass owners, DX12 support for PC players and more fixes for community-reported issues.

title: HITMAN 2 – March Roadmap
text: We’re super excited to reveal a bumper month of content for HITMAN 2 this month – and we’ve got something for all players!

title: HITMAN 2 – Elusive Target: The Politician
text: The clock is ticking… Get ready for the next Elusive Target in HITMAN 2 – The Politician! She will be in Hawke’s Bay for 10 days starting on March 8.

title: HITMAN 2 – Starter Pack
text: We’re excited to announce that we’re making the first location in HITMAN 2 free to play for everyone!

title: HITMAN 2 – February Update
text: The February Update for HITMAN 2 includes details on new gameplay changes and a host of bug fixes.

title: HITMAN on PlayStation Plus
text: HITMAN: The Complete First Season is now available for FREE with PlayStation Plus in February 2019.

title: HITMAN 2 – February Roadmap
text: Welcome to February in HITMAN 2 – a month full of content that will give you new challenges new rewards and more.

title: HITMAN 2 – Elusive Target: The Appraiser
text: The clock is ticking… Get ready for the third Elusive Target for HITMAN 2 – The Appraiser! She will be on the Isle of Sgàil for 10 days starting at 2 pm CET on Friday the 25th of January.

title: Winter Sports Pack
text: The Winter Sports Pack brings 5 new items and is the first content release for the HITMAN 2: Expansion Pass.

title: HITMAN 2 – Snow Festival
text: Celebrate the Winter season at the HITMAN 2 Snow Festival in Hokkaido and throw snowballs at your target in a new mission!

title: New Studio Head at IOI
text: Hakan Abrak has been at IOI for more than 10 years, spearheading the latest HITMAN episodic release and is a proven and experienced leader and passionate gamer. Today, Hakan has become the new Studio Head at Io-Interactive.

text: This week, we have opened the doors to our new development studio in the heart of Copenhagen and have a new company logo that represents our step into the digital…

text: Last week we returned from Cologne, Germany and the sensory overload that is the combination of GDC Europe and Gamescom. Here’s what happened.

title: IOI at GDC Europe 2015
text: Io-Interactive will be attending this year’s GDC Europe with 2 sessions – one on modular sandbox design and one on sound propagation – so if you’re going to GDC Europe this year, make sure you catch those!

title: Announcing: HITMAN
text: Io-Interactive has finally announced its new game, HITMAN™. The newest venture for us, Agent 47 and every single dedicated, wonderful fan of this franchise out there, is about to begin.
